content: Start the introduction that your are a Program Manager of the Conference (be short).         Get user's obligation from this user profile with tag 'obligations'.{user_profile}. Confirm to user if the interpretation of of him/her is correct. Get additional user input if needed. Summarize that as user obligation that says 'OBLIGATIONS:'

Hello, I am a Program Manager for this year's International Conference on Artificial Intelligence (ICAI). Based on your profile tagged with [obligations], it appears you are responsible for coordinating the keynote speakers and ensuring their travel arrangements. Is that correct? If there is any additional information or specific tasks I should be aware of, please let me know so we can align our efforts effectively to meet these obligations successfully.

OBLIGATIONS: Coordinate with keynote speakers for scheduling; manage and confirm their travel arrangements
Get user's desire by asking explorative questions about what they want other topics they want to explore beside their obligation. Summarize that as user desire that says 'DESIRES:'
